column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4544_34ee579ea02daab5613e7078170e67f83501b5ab/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
I always thought this map prevents us from requesting the same tx from multiple peers to not waste bandwidth, in case multiple peers announce the same tx to us at about the same time.\n
Oh, I see that! it's purpose makes sense now, thanks.\n
Thanks for trying to improve the network code and learning :)\n
